# wantsSoftwareDimming

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the screen may be dimmed lower than the hardware is normally capable of by emulating it in software.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var wantsSoftwareDimming: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

The default value is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false]. Enabling it may cause a loss in performance.

## Managing brightness

- **brightness**: The brightness level of the screen.
